Plot: An undercover Detroit cop navigates a dangerous neighborhood that's surrounded by a containment wall with the help of an ex-con in order to bring down a crime lord and his plot to devastate the entire city.
Title: Brick Mansions
Writer: Luc Besson (screenplay), Luc Besson (screenplay), Bibi Naceri (screenplay)
Actors: Paul Walker, David Belle, RZA, Gouchy Boy
tomatoConsensus: Choppily edited and largely bereft of plot, Brick Mansions wastes a likable cast on a pointless remake of the far more entertaining District B13.
